comment._content: Man they carry so much sail, and they are so fast, fantastic!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/67614081@N07] They don't make em like they used to! This is a great series of photos, seemingly all taken around the 1951 National and World's 18-footers Championships in Sydney Harbour. More to come :)
